removes snake and set way to north free
useKeyWithDoor(Item, T, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler

useMachete(Item, T, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
Uses Machete with given NonItem
useMacheteWithThornyBush(Item, NonItem, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
When the thorny bush gets cut down, this direction of both ways (beach/jungle or jungle/beach) is free, it moves to the other beach/jungle connection and blocks the way the other direction, same happens with the crocodile
useNoteWithSuitcase(Item, NonItem, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
When item note gets used with nonItem suitcase, the suitcase gets opened and releases its items, also the rucksack to increase the size of players inventory
usePickaxeWithCairn(Item, T, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
removes cairn and releases stone in the room + set way to west free
userInput - Variable in class view.GamePanel
String to handle userinput
useRopeWithTree(Item, NonItem, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
attach rope to banana tree and make bananas reachable
useRucksack(Item, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
When item rucksack is used the players inventory size will be increased by the rucksacks strength, rucksack gets removed from current room
useSeaShellWithRitual(Item, T, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
removes seashell and adds pickaxe to the players inventory
useSpear(Item, T, Game) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
Uses spear with given NonItem
useSpearWithCoconutPalm(Item, NonItem, Room) - Method in class zork.ActionHandler
Throw spear at coconut palm to get item coconut, will only work every third time the player tries this

Method to sharpen weapons with the grindstone in the traders hut
